# Mallorca Golf Exclusive - Complete Information

> Premium golf booking service in Mallorca, Spain. We help golfers from Germany, Sweden, Switzerland, UK, and France book tee times at 13 top golf courses, luxury hotel accommodations, and fine dining experiences.

## Company Overview

Mallorca Golf Exclusive is the premier golf concierge service in Mallorca with over 20 years of experience. We specialize in connecting discerning European golfers with Mallorca's most prestigious courses and exclusive partners.

### Target Markets
- Germany
- Sweden  
- Switzerland
- United Kingdom
- France

### Languages Supported
- English
- German (Deutsch)
- French (Français)
- Swedish (Svenska)

## Golf Courses Available

### Golf Alcanada
- Location: Alcúdia, Mallorca
- Price: From €115
- Holes: 18 | Par: 72
- Features: Ocean views, lighthouse views, golf academy, restaurant
- Booking: https://golfinmallorca.greenfee365.com/golf-course/golf-alcanada
- Description: Nestled along the coast with breathtaking views of the iconic lighthouse, Alcanada is a true gem of Mediterranean golf.

### Golf Son Gual Mallorca
- Location: Palma de Mallorca
- Price: From €85
- Holes: 18 | Par: 72
- Features: Championship course, practice range, pro shop, restaurant
- Booking: https://golfinmallorca.greenfee365.com/golf-course/golf-son-gual-mallorca
- Description: One of Europe's finest courses, Son Gual offers a world-class championship experience with stunning Mediterranean views.

### Pula Golf Resort
- Location: Son Servera, Mallorca
- Price: From €74
- Holes: 18 | Par: 72
- Features: Resort course, practice facilities, clubhouse, restaurant
- Booking: https://golfinmallorca.greenfee365.com/golf-course/pula-golf-resort
- Description: A beautiful resort course surrounded by natural beauty, offering a relaxed yet challenging golfing experience.

### Son Vida Golf
- Location: Palma de Mallorca
- Price: From €47
- Holes: 18 | Par: 72
- Features: Historic course, bay views, luxury hotel, fine dining
- Booking: https://golfinmallorca.greenfee365.com/golf-course/son-vida-golf
- Description: The oldest course in Mallorca, Son Vida offers a classic golfing experience with panoramic views of Palma Bay.

### Son Muntaner Golf
- Location: Palma de Mallorca
- Price: From €51
- Holes: 18 | Par: 72
- Features: Mountain views, technical design, wellness center, restaurant
- Booking: https://golfinmallorca.greenfee365.com/golf-course/son-muntaner-golf
- Description: A challenging course designed by Kurt Rossknecht, featuring dramatic elevation changes and mountain views.

### Son Quint Golf
- Location: Palma de Mallorca
- Price: From €58
- Holes: 18 | Par: 72
- Features: Modern design, practice range, pro shop, restaurant
- Booking: https://golfinmallorca.greenfee365.com/golf-course/son-quint-golf
- Description: A modern course with excellent facilities, Son Quint offers spectacular views and a memorable round.

### Son Antem Resort East Course
- Location: Llucmajor, Mallorca
- Price: From €54
- Holes: 18 | Par: 72
- Features: Resort course, Marriott hotel, spa, multiple restaurants
- Booking: https://golfinmallorca.greenfee365.com/golf-course/son-antem-resort-course
- Description: Part of the renowned Son Antem complex, this course offers a perfect blend of challenge and playability.

### Son Antem West Championship Course
- Location: Llucmajor, Mallorca
- Price: From €59
- Holes: 18 | Par: 72
- Features: Championship course, tournament ready, practice facilities, clubhouse
- Booking: https://golfinmallorca.greenfee365.com/golf-course/son-antem-championship-course
- Description: The championship course at Son Antem, designed for serious golfers seeking a premium challenge.

### Capdepera Golf
- Location: Capdepera, Mallorca
- Price: From €59
- Holes: 18 | Par: 72
- Features: Coastal views, well maintained, driving range, restaurant
- Booking: https://golfinmallorca.greenfee365.com/golf-course/capdepera-golf
- Description: Located in the beautiful northeast of Mallorca, Capdepera offers stunning coastal views and excellent conditions.

### Golf Santa Ponsa I
- Location: Santa Ponsa, Mallorca
- Price: From €66
- Holes: 18 | Par: 72
- Features: 3 courses available, European Tour venue, driving range, golf school
- Booking: https://golfinmallorca.greenfee365.com/golf-course/golf-santa-ponsa
- Description: Three exceptional courses set amidst pine forests, Santa Ponsa has hosted major European Tour events.

### Golf Son Servera
- Location: Son Servera, Mallorca
- Price: From €73
- Holes: 18 | Par: 72
- Features: Traditional course, scenic views, clubhouse, restaurant
- Booking: https://golfinmallorca.greenfee365.com/golf-course/golf-son-servera
- Description: A traditional Mallorcan course with beautiful views and a welcoming atmosphere for all skill levels.

### Vall D'Or Golf
- Location: Porto Colom, Mallorca
- Price: From €81
- Holes: 18 | Par: 71
- Features: Scenic course, natural setting, practice area, clubhouse
- Booking: https://golfinmallorca.greenfee365.com/golf-course/vall-dor-golf
- Description: A picturesque course in the east of Mallorca, Vall d'Or offers a unique golfing experience amid natural beauty.

### Real Golf De Bendinat
- Location: Bendinat, Mallorca
- Price: From €65
- Holes: 18 | Par: 70
- Features: Exclusive club, sea views, historic course, fine dining
- Booking: https://golfinmallorca.greenfee365.com/golf-course/real-golf-de-bendinat
- Description: An exclusive club near Palma, Bendinat offers a challenging layout with Mediterranean Sea views.

## Hotel Partners

### St. Regis Mardavall
- Location: Costa d'en Blanes
- Type: Luxury beachfront resort
- Offer: Golf & Stay Package - 3 nights + 2 rounds
- Price: From €899 (was €1,200 - 25% off)

### Belmond La Residencia
- Location: Deià
- Type: Mountain luxury hotel
- Offer: Golf shuttle + spa access included
- Price: From €1,199 (was €1,500 - 20% off)

### Cap Rocat
- Location: Cala Blava
- Type: Exclusive fortress retreat with private beach
- Offer: Golf experience with private transfers
- Price: From €1,449 (was €1,800 - 20% off)

## Restaurant Partners

### Es Fum
- Location: Costa d'en Blanes
- Type: Michelin-starred contemporary Mediterranean
- Offer: Golfer's menu - 6-course tasting + wine pairing
- Price: From €145 (was €180 - 20% off)

### Zaranda
- Location: Es Capdellà
- Type: Two Michelin stars, avant-garde Mallorcan cuisine
- Offer: After-golf special - tasting menu 15% off
- Price: From €187 (was €220 - 15% off)

### Bens d'Avall
- Location: Deià
- Type: Cliffside dining, Mediterranean seafood
- Offer: Sunset menu - 4 courses + local wine
- Price: From €79 (was €95 - 17% off)

## Contact Information

- Business Name: Mallorca Golf Exclusive

- Phone: +34 971 123 456

- Booking Platform: https://golfinmallorca.greenfee365.com

## Best Time to Visit

The best time to play golf in Mallorca is:
- Spring (March to May): 18-25°C, minimal rainfall
- Autumn (September to November): Pleasant temperatures, harvest season

Summer can exceed 30°C. Winter is mild but occasionally rainy.

## Client Reviews Summary

- Average Rating: 4.7/5 stars
- Total Reviews: 6+
- Top markets: Germany, Sweden, UK, France, Switzerland
